__TOC__

Ubuntu is planning to apply as a mentoring organization for Google Code In for 2016! For more information, see the <nowiki>[[https://developers.google.com/open-source/gci/|Google Code In Page]]</nowiki>, or <nowiki>[[https://community.ubuntu.com/contribute/google-code-in/|the community site]]</nowiki>. Still have questions? <nowiki>[[https://developers.google.com/open-source/gci/faq|Check out the FAQ]]</nowiki>.

The contest runs from December 2016 into January 2017. We are looking for mentors to help create tasks and mentor the students. Interested? Read on!

== Keeping in touch ==
We'll be communicating via IRC and the mailing list. If you are interested in helping or volunteer to be a mentor, please subscribe to the list and idle in the channel.

<nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu-google|#ubuntu-google on freenode]]</nowiki>

and

<nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-soc|ubuntu-soc mailing list]]</nowiki>
